amendment.description: To provide for a Department of Defense task force on mental health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1519 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1519 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To provide for a Department of Defense task force on mental health.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1519 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1519 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Boxer.
